name: Yokai Temple 妖怪寺
description:
Your name is Ringo. After many requests, the Yokai have finally agreed to teach you their trainings in the secret Yokai Temple. You've been warned: the Yokai usually don't like humans, so have a good attitude and stay away from those who look like they might cause trouble.

'YOKAI TEMPLE' is an experimental horror-ish game heavily influenced by both 'Monkey Island' and 'Faith'. You'll have to solve puzzles in order to make story progress, but you can always explore around in the sandbox! The main feature: you can switch between 2D and 3D camera anytime!
